sys_script.name: Recalculate technician open tickets

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1868112_aayos_ticket</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Recalculate technician open tickets</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

    // Status values that count as "open" work for the technician
    var OPEN_STATUSES = ['new', 'in_progress', 'on_hold'];

    function recalcForTech(techSysId) {
        if (!techSysId)
            return;

        // Count open tickets for this technician
        var tgr = new GlideRecord('x_1868112_aayos_ticket');
        tgr.addQuery('assigned_technician', techSysId);
        tgr.addQuery('status', 'IN', OPEN_STATUSES.join(','));
        tgr.query();

        var count = 0;
        while (tgr.next())
            count++;

        // Update the technician record
        var tech = new GlideRecord('x_1868112_aayos_technician');
        if (tech.get(techSysId)) {
            tech.setValue('current_open_tickets', count);
            tech.update();
        }
    }

    var currentTech  = String(current.assigned_technician || '');
    var previousTech = (previous && previous.assigned_technician)
        ? String(previous.assigned_technician)
        : '';

    // INSERT: new ticket assigned to a technician
    if (current.operation() === 'insert') {
        recalcForTech(currentTech);
        return;
    }

    // DELETE: ticket removed; use previous technician
    if (current.operation() === 'delete') {
        recalcForTech(previousTech);
        return;
    }

    // UPDATE: only react when status or assigned technician changes
    if (current.operation() === 'update') {

        var statusChanged = current.status.changes();
        var techChanged   = current.assigned_technician.changes();

        if (!statusChanged && !techChanged)
            return;

        // Always recalc for the "new" technician
        recalcForTech(currentTech);

        // If reassigned, also recalc for the old one
        if (techChanged && currentTech !== previousTech) {
            recalcForTech(previousTech);
        }
    }

})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-12-04 02:04:44</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>579e00ae97697ed0ec453b90f053af09</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Recalculate technician open tickets</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="AAYOS" source="x_1868112_aayos">992cea7c971db250ec453b90f053af4b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AAYOS">992cea7c971db250ec453b90f053af4b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_579e00ae97697ed0ec453b90f053af09</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-12-05 03:02:15</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=579e00ae97697ed0ec453b90f053af09"/></record_update>
